title: How we can help you?
subject: Yaroslav from DentalTap
descr2:
My name is Yaroslav and I'm the founder of DentalTap. Thank you for your interest in our company. We would like to create an excellent experience for you of using our product.
We would like to hear and appreciate any feedback about our product, as it help us move forward and be even better.
How about a brief 15 to 20 minute online-call next week where we can discuss your goals and challenges and share any value and insight that we have to offer?

Thank you and looking forward to hear from you!


Thank you,
Yaroslav
